Class BudgetItem

BudgetItem class is used to store and access all the properties of the budget.

Inheritance

Properties

Amount

Automatically implemented property to store the amount value of the item.

Declaration
public double Amount { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Double

The Amount property represents the cost of the item

Balance

Automatically implemented property to store the balance.

Declaration
public double Balance { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Double

The Balance property represents the total left according to the amount spent or received

public string Category { get; set; }

The Category property represents the category of the item.

Declaration
public int CategoryID { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description

The CategoryID property represents the category id of the item.

Declaration
public DateTime Date { get; set; }

Declaration
public int ExpenseID { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Int32

The ExpenseID property represents the expense id of the item.

Automatically implemented property to store a small description of the item.

Declaration
public string ShortDescription { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

The ShortDescription property represents a brief description (name) of the item
